Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Beijing (Middle Chaoyang), Rosedale Hotel and Suite Beijing is convenient to Lady Street and 798 Space. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of National Agricultural Exhibition Center and Nali Patio.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 462 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and LCD televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as a fitness center or take in the view from a garden. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and wedding services.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Planning an event in Beijing? This hotel has 18880 square feet (1754 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 7 AM Check-out time is 2 PM
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Located in Beijing (Middle Chaoyang), Rosedale Hotel and Suite Beijing is convenient to Lady Street and 798 Space. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of National Agricultural Exhibition Center and Nali Patio.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Lady Street - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
798 Space - 2 km / 1.2 mi
National Agricultural Exhibition Center - 3.8 km / 2.4 mi
Nali Patio - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi
Chaoyang Park - 4.4 km / 2.7 mi
Yashow Market - 4.9 km / 3 mi
Workers Stadium - 5.1 km / 3.2 mi
Green T. House Art Gallery - 5.3 km / 3.3 mi
Tiandi Theater - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi
Poly Theater - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Ditan Park - 5.7 km / 3.5 mi
Dongsishitiao Bridge - 5.8 km / 3.6 mi
Chaoyang Theater - 5.8 km / 3.6 mi
Lama Temple - 5.8 km / 3.6 mi
Dong Yue Miao - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi

The preferred airport for Rosedale Hotel and Suite Beijing is Beijing (PEK-Capital Intl.) - 15.5 km / 9.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Rosedale Hotel and Suite Beijing is Beijing (PEK-Capital Intl.) - 16.3 km / 10.1 mi.
